image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Nyack, Rockland County, N.Y., May 18, 1987; graduated from Spring Valley High School, Spring Valley, N.Y., 2005; B.A., Stanford University, Stanford, Calif., 2009; J.D., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 2013; staff, United States Department of Justice, 2009–2010; lawyer, private practice; Westchester County, N.Y., attorney, 2018-2019; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress (January 3, 2021-January 3, 2023); unsuccessful candidate for renomination to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress in 2022.
